properties.Name: Fraserside Community Services - Subsidy Programs

properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming
properties.Hours: Hours vary by program, please visit website for more details

properties.Name: New Westminster Community Schools
properties.Descr: Community Schools are committed to bringing programs and services to district schools in seven core programming and service areas: physical activity, arts and exploration, literacy, leadership, social responsibility, resources for children, youth and fam
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming
properties.Email: District Community School Coordinators: Robin Stewart (rstewart@sd40.bc.ca), Andrea Owen (aowen@sd40.bc.ca)

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Canada Games Pool
properties.Descr: Indoor swimming and fitness facilities, including aquatics and fitness programming. There are free swims during certain periods of the week/month, please contact New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation or view the Active Living Guide for details.
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming
properties.Hours: Facility is open on Monday-Thursday, 6:00 am - 9:55 pm, Friday, 6:00 am - 10:25 pm, Saturday, 8:00 am - 8:25 pm, Sunday, 8:00 am - 9:55 pm , hours for particular programs and services vary

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Centennial Community Centre
properties.Descr: Offers various fitness, sports, culture, arts and other programming.
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming
properties.Hours: Monday-Friday, 9:00 am - 8:30 pm, Friday, 9:00 am - 8:00 pm, Saturday, 8:00 am - 1:00 pm, Sunday, 8:30 am - 12:00 pm

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Century House
properties.Descr: Offers various programs for persons 50+ years old.
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming
properties.Hours: Monday-Friday, 9:00 am - 9:00 pm, Saturday, 9:00 am - 4:00 pm, Sunday, 12:00 pm - 4:00 pm (reduced hours during July & August)

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Hume Park Outdoor Pool
properties.Descr: Outdoor swimming facilities, including aquatics programming. There are free swims during certain periods of the week, please contact New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation or view the Active Living Guide for details.
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming
properties.Hours: Variable (weather-dependent) but usually open from late June to Labour Day from 1:15 pm - 8:00 pm

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Moody Park Arena
properties.Descr: Indoor ice skating rink that offers various ice sports related programs.
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Moody Park Outdoor Pool
properties.Descr: Outdoor swimming facilities, including aquatics programming. There are free swims during certain periods of the week, please contact New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation or view the Active Living Guide for details .
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming
properties.Hours: Variable (weather-dependent) but usually open from late June to Labour Day from 1:15 pm - 8:00 pm

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Museum and Archives (located at Anvil Centre)
properties.Descr: Offers various cultural programs and exhibits at museum and archives.
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming
properties.Hours: Monday-Wednesday, Friday-Sunday, 10:00 am - 5:00 pm, Thursday, 10:00 am - 8:00 pm

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Queens Park Arena
properties.Descr: Indoor ice skating rink that offers various ice sports related programs (and other sports during summer months). Location is within Queens Park itself near 3rd Avenue entrance.
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Queens Park Arenex
properties.Descr: Indoor facility that includes a gymnasium and has various sports programs. Location is within Queens Park itself near 3rd Avenue entrance.
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming
properties.Hours: Program hours vary, refer to Active Living Guide for more details

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Queensborough Community Centre
properties.Descr: Facility includes a fitness centre, gymnasium, a library, meeting rooms and more. Various programs offered.
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming
properties.Hours: Monday-Friday, 7:00 am - 9:30 pm, Saturday, 8:30 am - 5:30 pm, Sunday, 8:30 am - 8:30 pm

properties.Name: New Westminster Parks, Culture and Recreation - Youth Centre
properties.Descr: Indoor facility with a gymnasium, fitness centre and various activities for youth (13-18 years old).
properties.Category: Parks, Recreation and Community School Programming

properties.Name: Association of Community Organizations for Reform Now (ACORN)
properties.Descr: ACORN has many social justice advocacy campaigns, including campaigns supporting affordable housing and renters.

properties.Name: Aunt Leah's Place
properties.Descr: Provides housing subsidy program (HELPS) for former foster children. Also manages a Housing First LINK program that can connect foster youth with housing options.

properties.Name: CMHA (Canadian Mental Health Association) - Vancouver Fraser Branch
properties.Descr: Provides a variety of housing assistance programs for persons with mental illness, including subsidy programs and case managers that assist people with finding housing.

properties.Name: Lookout Emergency Aid Society Housing Outreach Team
properties.Descr: Assists people on the street or at high risk of eviction with their housing needs. Services include advocacy, assessment, liason and referral.

properties.Name: MOSAIC
properties.Descr: Settlement workers can help newcomers to Canada in finding a place to live.

properties.Name: New Westminster Homelessness Coalition Society - I's on the Street
properties.Descr: As part of I's on the Street program, helps to connect homeless or at risk of homeless people with support services such as shelter and housing.

properties.Name: Seniors Services Society
properties.Descr: Provides housing counseling, housing outreach services, and a shelter program for homeless and at risk seniors (55+).
properties.Hours: Monday - Friday, 8:30 am - 12:30 pm, 1:00 pm - 4:30 pm

properties.Name: Spirit of the Children Society
properties.Descr: Support for families needing support to obtain or sustain their housing. Program is based on the Seven Sacred Teachings and the Medicine Wheel.

properties.Name: British Columbia Provincial Government - Ministry of Children and Family Development
properties.Descr: Provides child and youth mental health services.

properties.Name: Canadian Mental Health Association (Vancouver - Fraser Branch)
properties.Descr: Offers education, housing and outreach services for mental health clients.

properties.Name: Community Mental Health Centre - New Westminster Mental Health Office
properties.Descr: Provides a variety of mental health services.

properties.Name: DEWY (Pacific Community Resources)
properties.Descr: DEWY assists youth aged 13 to 18 years old who have problems with alcohol and/or drug use.

properties.Name: Douglas College Dental Assisting Clinic
properties.Descr: Provides reduced cost preventative dental services for patients between the ages of 4 and 25 years old.

properties.Name: Family Services of Greater Vancouver - Counselling Services
properties.Descr: Provides counselling services to families, children and adults.

properties.Name: Fraser Health Authority - New Westminster Public Health Unit
properties.Descr: Provides a variety of public health services, including vaccines.

properties.Name: Fraser Health Authority - Royal Columbian Hospital
properties.Descr: Hospital that provides a variety of services including trauma care, birth services, emergency services etc.
properties.Hours: Facility is open 7 days a week, 24 hours a day

properties.Name: Fraserside Community Services - Children Who Witness Abuse
properties.Descr: Frasersides Children Who Witness Abuse (CWWA) program provides group and individual counselling to children who have been affected by witnessing the abuse of a parent or caregiver.

properties.Name: Inpatient Psychiatry Unit at Sherbrooke Centre (Royal Columbian Hospital)
properties.Descr: Provides services to admitted inpatients requiring further support managing mental health issues.

properties.Name: Last Door Recovery Centre
properties.Descr: Long-term residential treatment centre for men who are experiencing problematic substance misuse.

properties.Name: Last Door Youth Program
properties.Descr: Residential Program for male youth ages 14 to 18 who are experiencing problematic substance misuse.

properties.Name: New West UBC Counselling Centre
properties.Descr: Provides free counselling to adults, adolescents, and families from September to June.

properties.Name: New Westminster Homelessness Coalition Society - I's on the Street
properties.Descr: As part of I's on the Street program, helps to connect homeless or at risk of homeless people with support services such as addictions and mental health.

properties.Name: New Westminster Public Health Unit - Prevention and Health Promotion for Substance Use
properties.Descr: The prevention and health promotion for substance use services provides support services to improve the health and functioning of children and youth with mental health disorders or potential problematic substance misuse.

properties.Name: Perspectives Adult & Youth Addiction Services
properties.Descr: Provides free one-to-one and group counseling services to anyone affected, either directly or indirectly by the misuse of alcohol or other drugs. Self referrals accepted.
properties.Hours: Monday to Friday, 9:00 am-12:00 pm, 1:00 pm-5:00 pm

properties.Name: Pregnancy Outreach Programs - Olivet Baptist Church
properties.Descr: Provides programs that assist pregnant women and their infants who need extra help and support. Programs may provide weekly lunches, food vouchers, prenatal vitamins, educational sessions, and one-on-one support from trained volunteer mentors. Program pr
properties.Hours: Tuesday, 10:30 am - 1:00 pm for moms and babies up to 6 months, Tuesday, 12:00 pm - 2:30 pm for pregnant women

properties.Name: Purpose Society - Youth Clinic
properties.Descr: Youth can talk with an alcohol or drug counsellor or therapist.
properties.Hours: Tuesday, 2:30 pm - 6:00 pm, Thursday, 3:00 pm - 7:00 pm

properties.Name: Purpose Society Community Clinic and Resource Centre for Adults
properties.Descr: Free walk-in clinic to improve the health and wellbeing of people who may otherwise be unable to receive treatment.
properties.Hours: First and third Friday of every month, 11:00 am - 1:00 pm

properties.Name: Sherbrooke Centre at Royal Columbian Hospital
properties.Descr: Offers psychiatric group therapy program and fraser early psychosis intervention program.
properties.Hours: Group therapy program, hours vary. Early psychosis intervention program: Monday-Friday, 8:30am-4:30pm
properties.Phone: psychiatric group therapy program ((604)520-4397), Fraser Early Psychosis Intervention Program ((604)777-8386); 24 hour crisis line: (604)951-8855

properties.Name: Union Gospel Mission
properties.Descr: Provides counselling services. Has an Alcoholics Anonymous Group.
properties.Hours: Counselling, Monday-Friday: 1:00 pm - 3:00 pm (by appointment), Alcoholics Appointment, Tuesday, 1:00 pm

properties.Name: Westminster House Recovery Program for Women
properties.Descr: Long-term residential recovery centre for women healing from addiction.

properties.Name: Elizabeth Fry Society of Greater Vancouver - Maida Duncan Drop-In Centre
properties.Descr: Offers marginalized women a place to go for hot lunches, showers, laundry, free clothing and household items, as well social activities and education upgrading.

properties.Name: Union Gospel Mission
properties.Descr: Breakfast and soup programs.
properties.Hours: Breakfast Service: Monday-Friday, 8:30 am - 9:30 am, Soup Service: Monday-Friday, 11:15 am - 12:00 pm

properties.Name: Aunt Leah's Place
properties.Descr: Offers support services to foster children, former foster children and young mothers, including housing, job training and life skills.

properties.Name: British Columbia Provincial Government - Family Justice Centre
properties.Descr: Providers information and assistance to families that are considering or experiencing separation or divorce.
properties.Hours: Monday, Wednesday-Friday, 8:00 am - 5:15 pm, Thursday, 8:00 am - 7:00 pm

properties.Name: British Columbia Provincial Government - Ministry of Children and Family Development
properties.Descr: Provides child and youth mental health services, and child and family services (including child protection programs, adoption programs etc).

properties.Name: Camaray Centre - Parent Support Program at Centennial Community Centre
properties.Descr: Offers prevention and early intervention services to parents and parents-to-be to increase a familys knowledge and skills for effective parenting to strengthen family resiliency.

properties.Name: Family Services of Greater Vancouver
properties.Descr: Provides a range of programs from prevention to intervention. Specific programs include: community education, counselling, employment assistance, family and parenting services, immigrant support, victim assistance and youth services.

properties.Name: Fraserside Community Services Society
properties.Descr: Provides a range of services to individuals and families including: Children Who Witness Abuse counselling, emergency shelter for families and programs for adults with developmental and mental health issues.

properties.Name: Immigrant Services of Society of British Columbia
properties.Descr: Provides settlement services to newcomers, including career guidance and training, confidential support, information and referral and social connections.

properties.Name: Inclusion BC
properties.Descr: Provides a variety of support services to persons with special needs (intellectual disabilities) and their families

properties.Name: Lower Mainland Purpose Society
properties.Descr: Delivers a continuum of programs to children, youth and families. Specific programs include child care, counselling, health, an independent secondary school, information and referral, settlement services and youth programming.

properties.Name: New Westminster Family Place
properties.Descr: Provides a family resource program for families with children from newborn to five years old.
properties.Hours: Drop-in: Monday - Tuesday, 9:30 am - 11:30 am, 1:00pm - 3:00 pm, Wednesday - Friday, 9:30 am - 11:30 am. Please check Family Place website for program hours

properties.Name: Salvation Army Family Services
properties.Descr: Provides community and family services, including childcare.

properties.Name: Simon Fraser Society for Community Living
properties.Descr: Have programs for children with special needs, including New Westminster Supported Child Development, New Westminster Aboriginal Supported Child Development, and Key Support Worker.

properties.Name: Spirit of the Children Society
properties.Descr: Supports Aboriginal families by providing information on resources and holds various programs to bring the Aboriginal community together.

properties.Name: Western Society for Children
properties.Descr: Provides family support and rehabilitation, parenting information, pre-employment, recreation, resources and social support for children with disabilities.

properties.Name: Douglas College Food Bank
properties.Descr: Provides food bank services for Douglas College students.

properties.Name: Ecole Qayqayt Elementary School - Hot Lunch Program
properties.Descr: Provides an in-house hot lunch program for Ecole Qayqayt Elementary School Students (grades K-7).

properties.Descr: Provides an in-house hot lunch program for Lord Kelvin Elementary School Students (grades K-7).

properties.Name: New Westminster Family Place
properties.Descr: Food bank drop-in.

properties.Name: Port Royal Community Garden
properties.Descr: New Westminster residents can grow food in a community garden in Port Royal. Actual community garden is located in Port Royal Park (near Star Crescent); location shown is just the administrative location. There are other community gardens in New Westmins

properties.Name: Pregnancy Outreach Programs - Olivet Baptist Church
properties.Descr: These programs assist pregnant women and their infants who need extra help and support. Programs may provide weekly lunches, food vouchers and prenatal vitamins. Program provided through Burnaby Family Life Institute.
properties.Hours: Tuesday, 10:30 am - 1:00 pm for moms and babies up to 6 months, Tuesday, 12:00 pm - 2:30 pm for pregnant women

properties.Name: Salvation Army - Community Lunch and Food Programs

properties.Name: Spirit of the Children Society - Traditional Kitchen for Aboriginal Families and Youth

properties.Name: Bluebird House

properties.Name: Cliff Block Housing Centre
properties.Descr: Provides transitional housing units and supportive permanent housing units for persons in need. Managed by Lookout Society

properties.Name: Columbia House

properties.Name: Columbia Place

properties.Name: Elizabeth Barnett Terrace
properties.Descr: Supported independent living units. Managed by Pioneer Community Living Association.

properties.Name: Elizabeth Gurney House

properties.Name: Extreme Weather Response Shelter
properties.Descr: Provides shelter beds for homeless men and women during extreme weather (very hot, very cold, very wet, very snowy etc.).

properties.Name: Fraserside Community Shelter

properties.Name: Genesis House
properties.Descr: Provides supportive housing for persons with substance use issues. Managed by Westcoast Genesis Society.

properties.Name: Pathways
properties.Descr: Semi-independent (second stage) apartments for women without resources or who are in transition to independent living. Managed by Elizabeth Fry Society of Greater Vancouver.

properties.Name: Pioneer House

properties.Name: Rhoda Kaellis Residence

properties.Descr: Offers electronic and written resources (books, videos etc), learning related events and programs for children, teens and adults. Also has ESL conversation circles.
